text: "People Get Ready" is a 1965 song by The Impressions. It is the title track from their fourth studio album of the same name. It went to number 14 in the United States. It was covered by Jeff Beck and Rod Stewart in 1985. It went to number 23 in Australia and number 48 in the United States. ==References== Category:1965 songs Category:The Impressions songs Category:Jeff Beck songs Category:Rod Stewart songs Category:Bob Dylan songs Category:Al Green songs Category:Aretha Franklin songs Category:Alicia Keys songs Category:Eva Cassidy songs Category:Michelle Wright songs Category:Billy Joel songs Category:U2 songs
title: People Get Ready
